weka.clusterers.kvalid

Class SilhouetteIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.clusterers.kvalid.SilhouetteIndex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ClusterEvaluator

    public class SilhouetteIndex
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, ClusterEvaluator
    SilhouetteIndex cluster evaluator. The SI measures how similar an object is to its own cluster compared to other clusters.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
